p: Microorganisms and media. The bacteria used in this study were chosen primarily on the basis of their importance as opportunistic microorganisms for humans with diabetes mellitus. The bacterial strains include: Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883, Staphylococcus aureus, ATCC 29213, Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 19582, Escherichia coli 25922, Bacillus pumilus ATCC 14884, Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228.
